website_summaries.verdict: This mister comes with a wide mouth that makes it easier to refill.
pros: Cap allows you to re-pump pressure into the sprayer as needed
cons: This mister will need to be completely emptied and cleaned between refills to prevent clogging

customer_reviews.title: HUGE disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I have read the instructions, cleaned, filled, assembled, tried to mist, and dis-assembled this mister time and time again. I can get a very weak mist with vinegar or water, but nothing with olive oil. I saw that a small plastic or silicone washer came off during cleaning and may have prevented operation, but replacing it didn’t help at all. Great idea. Poor execution. Difficult to clean and difficult to use.
customer_reviews.author: Ido1der

customer_reviews.title: Plastic Screw Cap Broke In Less Than 10 Uses!
customer_reviews.text: broke after less than ten uses. The plastic ring that screws onto the container that holds the oil broke apart. This is unfortunate because it seemed nice during the few times I actually got to use it. I even made sure to follow the instructions and never over-pressurized the sprayer.
customer_reviews.author: A. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Fine life oil sprayer
customer_reviews.text: Had great hopes for this item, which were smashed @ 2nd use when spray became a small stream. Returned for refund
customer_reviews.author: julia

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a replacement for a mister that quit working after many many years - I'm very happy with this new one. Easy to fill and with the clear fill to line no guessing what is the correct amount. It sprays a fine mist that I really like for lightly covering a sheet pan and have also found great when roasting a chicken - just give the bird a nice mist and sprinkle on the seasonings. I've had no issues with clogging nor with it not spraying if not held correctly - it will spray at all angles.
customer_reviews.author: Scribbles

customer_reviews.title: This produces a "cloud" of very fine oil instead of a spray to the food
customer_reviews.text: This produces a "cloud" of very fine oil instead of a spray to the food. Not what I want in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Granny Gump

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Oil Mister
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Olive Oil Mister like many other people to control the amount of oil used for cooking. Actually I am using Avocado Oil as I am not a fan of Olive Oil. Also I cook with a Air Fryer, which uses high heat (a no-no for Olive Oil), the mister makes it easy to spray the basket or grill. Also easy to see the amount sprayed.. What I like about this mister is the look and also the feel (holding in my hand). It is very easy to use, comes with great directions. I would recommend for anyone needing a mister.
customer_reviews.author: P. Taylor-Harris

customer_reviews.title: PERFECTION
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased a couple of sprayers to use specifically for my new Air Fryer. Neither one of them misted the oil. A mist was what I needed. Last week I ordered the Ideal Olive Oil Sprayer Mister and it is truly amazing! Exactly what was advertised and puts out the perfect mist for my air fryer. Also I was very impressed that the company notified me by email that the mister had been shipped and wanted me to know that they wanted their customers to be satisfied and to let them know if I had any problems or questions! What wonderful customer service!!!
customer_reviews.author: Patsy Elmore

customer_reviews.title: Never works right
customer_reviews.text: I bought this overpriced oil mister awhile ago [2017] and it never worked right from the beginning. As I recall the seller sent me a new nozzle/pump and gave me some tips. A few times I was able to get it to work but for the most part it just sprayed a stream of oil or the pump got stuck so I set it aside. Today I thought I would give it another try but no luck the pump seems to be permanently stuck in the down position.
customer_reviews.author: PHL1111

customer_reviews.title: It is great because it minimizes the amount of oil you actually ...
customer_reviews.text: I have bene looking for one of these for a while. It is great because it minimizes the amount of oil you actually use when cooking or coating things. It provides a good uniform misting pattern, Some of these can get clogged up and just drip out of the nozzle. I have only had this for a few months,but have not had any issues like this. I have been very happy with it, and it even looks pretty nice. It sits on top of my range with the salt and pepper adn has become a regular staple for food preparation and anything requiring oil. Very happy with this mister.
customer_reviews.author: as84

customer_reviews.title: Nowhere near worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: The should sell these in 2 packs, one for now and a second for next week when the first one breaks. Worked for about a month, then failed to spray. Disassembled the sprayer, cleaned with soapy water, and ran some of the water through the sprayer, but when dried and refilled, failed to spray as originally, and soon totally failed again.
customer_reviews.author: Spyderman

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra money - I learned from experience!
customer_reviews.text: First, I purchased a different product, an $11 oil "mister", not quite wanting to spend $30 on a mister. I immediately returned it, as it was essentially a stainless steel squirt bottle. THEN I purchased the Fine Life mister, which was my original choice and it is exactly what I wanted. A true pressurized oil sprayer with an easy pump and simple parts. I've been using it for a few weeks now and it's been perfect!! I feel so much better using 100% oil in my cooking spray instead of propellants and silicon! Thanks for your great customer service e too.
customer_reviews.author: alta27

customer_reviews.title: It works great and is worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased an olive oil mister from Pampered Chef a few years ago. It worked "fine". I am trying to eliminate as many chemicals as I can from my food, so I went looking to find a second mister that I could put canola oil in. I was hesitant to purchase this one at first because it was more expensive than some of the other ones, but I decided to give it a try. I have been VERY happy with this product. PLEASE take the time to read the helpful hints that accompany the product. It will be worth your time and likely make your experience more satisfactory. I am extremely pleased with this product!
customer_reviews.author: MRHARR

customer_reviews.title: Mine doesn't work.
customer_reviews.text: I received this oil mister today. I read the directions carefully. Rinsed and let air dry. I filled a very slight bit below the fill line with extra virgin olive oil only. I assembled it correctly and tightly. It doesn't give any resistance, build pressure, or spray at all. I have just registered it on the manufacturer's website, and logged a complaint. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I like it! Works really well, and I like that we no longer have to buy the aerosol cans at the store; they last such a short time, are chemical-laden, and wasteful in their packaging. This mister lets us use our own quality EVOO without any of those other things. We do however live in Colorado at a higher elevation than most and the mister requires way more than the recommended 6-9 pumps in order to build pressure. To be fair, The Fine Life, does tell you this. Obviously that effects the ease of use--still, it's worthwhile.
customer_reviews.author: RachelA

customer_reviews.title: Broke in less than 2 months
customer_reviews.text: So I bought a cheap oil sprayer recently and it broke very quickly. I decided I got what I paid for and ordered this one online after seeing good reviews. I’ve had it for less than 2 months and the lid is no longer sealing so it won’t work at all. I paid 30$ for this thing and expected it to last for years. I guess I give up on having an oil sprayer. Even when it was working it made a cloud when I used it, that I wasn’t very fond of.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Burrell

customer_reviews.title: The Top-Rated Winner!
customer_reviews.text: I did my research online, searching for reviews on the "best olive oil spray mister." This one, by Fine Line, received the #1 top rating, on more than one list. The most important feature, for me, was "no clog." This item is more expensive than the other two top-rated spray misters (# 2 & #3). However, I decided to purchase this one. It is important to precisely follow the instructions, so that it will work perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Marmee

customer_reviews.title: Does not mist anymore, just one thick long stream of oil.
customer_reviews.text: I want to cry, mine worked good but now it just sprays one long stream. It doesn't mist anymore, which is what I want. So sad!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Mist sprayer, any oil, no clogging!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE mine! Have used it daily for 3 months, and it has held up perfectly. I use mine to spray my pan for eggs, and to prep/cook food in my air fryer. My big question before I bought was if it would spray a mist like Pam or if it would clog and shoot a nasty jet stream instead. It sprays like Pam, it hasn't clogged, and it is everything I hoped it would be. I use olive oil in mine, but I'm sure any oil would work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice product for cutting down oil use
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for several months now. Sometimes the oil comes out in such a fine mist, it's almost like gas and seems to end up more in the air. Sometimes the droplets are larger and if I press the pump for too long, my finger gets very oily. I wanted a product that will help me coat a pan without using too much oil and for the most part, the product works well. Happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Oil Mister
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this mister. It does actually mist unlike some others that I've tried. It seems a little pricey, but you get what you pay for. The seller has even sent follow-up emails to be sure I am satisfied with their product and they've also sent tips for using the mister. I'm using it to mist canola oil on food that I'm cooking in my air fryer oven.
customer_reviews.author: The Nurse

customer_reviews.title: Used every day since I bought it!  Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this mister. I am shocked at how much oil we were using. We recently bought an Air fryer as well and the two go very well together! Love to spritz some oil and then spritz some vinegar (different mister that I already had) on my salad! I am gaining a new appreciation for the real taste of food!
customer_reviews.author: Buggie129

customer_reviews.title: Spray Without the Chemicals!!
customer_reviews.text: I have to say I don't know how I ever did without this little gadget! It make it easy to spray olive oil on items to keep from dousing them in oil. Limits the calories! Just a few pumps and it sprays just like an aerosol without the chemicals! Win win! Just remember to release the remaining pressure after you are done to keep the seal intact. You should wash the nozzle in warm water too to keep it open! If you do these simple things, you should have this sprayer for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Karaffa

customer_reviews.title: The Fine Life Olive Oil Mister is superb
customer_reviews.text: The Fine Life Olive Oil Mister is superb. The mister is used daily to spray my skillets, baking sheets, casserole dishes and even vegetables I cook on the grill. The pressure is excellent, delivering a steady, forceful mist. There has been no clogging of the pump. I really like the fact that the company followed up with me after I placed my order to thank me for ordering their product and to provide me with some helpful information then again after I received the product to see if I had any questions. Customer service still exists with this company!
customer_reviews.author: diving-girl

customer_reviews.title: 2nd one
customer_reviews.text: Bought one years ago and when it finally got partially clogged (came out in a stream) I wrote to the seller, they sent me VERY detailed things to try to remedy. Unfortunately none worked. After reading so many reviews of other products that hardly work when new I decided to stick with the one that did me good for so many years.
customer_reviews.author: JJdeadhead

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this sprayer, this one was recommended on some youtube video I watched so I purchased it and am glad I did. It pumps easily, sprays a nice calm spray so you can spray a little or a lot, no blowing air like a can sprays, a nice addition to my kitchen and look pretty on the counter by my cooktop.
customer_reviews.author: Scrappy Happy

customer_reviews.title: Great Mister.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this over a month and use it every day for olive oil. It has a nice fine spray and a wide surface on the pump top. I had another popular brand that was cheaper in the past. I prefer this as the spray is finer, easy to pump, and the clear bottle shows the amount and condition of the oil. The manufacturer emailed helpful tips for use. It is so much better than spray cans, just pure oil. If you don't mind spending more on quality kitchen items, this is for you.
customer_reviews.author: Barb B

customer_reviews.title: "Best purchase"
customer_reviews.text: My husband commented that this is the best purchase I have made! It's doesn't stray excactly like PAM stray, but it's close and so much healthier. We use it everyday, no problems .
customer_reviews.author: Occupational therapist and parent of 2 kids

customer_reviews.title: Only Mister I ever purchased that worked at promised.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two misters as gifts for my daughter and one of my granddaughters. I already have two of my own and I'm very happy with them.First I'm grateful they work so well and I found them after years of using canned aerosol sprays that have more than I really wanted in them. High cholesterol runs in our families so we have learn to use the most healthy oils and to use them sparingly. You mister works perfectly for this
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Carson

customer_reviews.title: Broke after three months
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed in the manufacturing of this mister. Within three months, the black ring around the pump cracked and broke and quit working. I was careful with it, never overpumped and only used it a few times a week. Maybe it was a manufacturing defect, but ultimately $30 dollars for three months of use was not worth it. When it was functioning, I actually quite liked it. Such a bummer.
customer_reviews.author: meredith roberts

customer_reviews.title: Nice sprayer, but.....
customer_reviews.text: The misting only lasted for a short while, then it turned into a sprayer, even after cleaning, The sprayer was still perfect for my needs though. But now I have a slow air leak coming from the under spray button. The bottle loses air pressure quickly because of this. I loved this sprayer, when it worked. For the price, I would have hoped it lasted longer.
customer_reviews.author: Mavis

customer_reviews.title: Best mister ever!
customer_reviews.text: I have two, one for olive and one for coconut. They are used every day several times a day in my home. I wouldn't be without them! I recently replaced one because the plastic ring cracked. When I went to reorder, I saw that the one I was replacing was over two years old. Well worth the $$$ - how many disposable ones might I have gone through in that time? Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: MommyD3

customer_reviews.title: The only one that does what it's supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: First I ordered a cheaper one because I didn't want to spend the money for this one. It was completely worthless and I sent it back. I read reviews on a couple midrange ones and it sounds like they have the exact same problems. They don't spray they just kind of spit and dribble and make a mess so I forked out the cash and got the ideal mister and don't regret it a bit. It sprays almost exactly like a can of pam or something! I love it! We have olive oil in ours and it hardly uses any and coats stuff perfectly! Definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Arron

customer_reviews.title: This product does not perform as advertised...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product to use to spray items going into an air fryer, such as for fried chicken. I pumped it as recommended in the instructions, saying that the spray would last about 15 seconds. Not only did it not last that long, using a light olive oil, but the spray was very light and would not cover the product/chicken. I needed to go back to the aerosol cans I was trying to get away from to have the coverage needed to cook. I also tried to use it for a salad, with the same experience. Very expensive product for very poor results. I will not be able to use this for much of anything!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Died after three years
customer_reviews.text: It is locked up solid and the spry button cannot be depressed, even when I pound on it. It got only light use, certainly no more than an average of twice a month since July 2019, so I'm disappointed. Time to look at Misto.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: awful
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this item to use with my new airfryer, after significant researching variety of misters. Soooooo disappointed! Filled exactly as instructed with olive oil, to fill line, pumped up and sprayed....great mist of oil, but leaked all around the top and made huge mess! Figured I must not have screwed top on tight enough, after read some reviews that said not to screw on too tight, however when screwed on tighter it continued to leak all over!
customer_reviews.author: carol mchugh-colburn

customer_reviews.title: Works well to distribute an even fine mist, works better that the Misto mister I ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well to distribute an even fine mist, works better that the Misto mister I had previously. The clear container allows you to see how much oil you have left and how much to fill.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great but over priced!
customer_reviews.text: The mister delivers a fine mist instead of using a brush which delivers too much oil. I was a bit surprised that it is made entirely of plastic, for the selling price of $25 surely you could have priced it at $10 or less and still have doubled your money!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great Mister
customer_reviews.text: This is a great Oil mister. We are trying to eliminate as much processed foods as possible from our diet. No more PAM in our house since this works so well. Fill the bottle up with oil - I use olive oil - pump it to pressurize it & spray. When finished, simply unscrew the top a little until you hear the pressure release. I have been very pleased with this purchase. Easy to use & works well. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Clogs like the rest. Started out great but has clogged twice. I have an ultrasonic cleaner I use for technical pens at work, and that helps. But the performance of this product is spotty at best.
customer_reviews.author: Cliff

customer_reviews.title: Nice spray coverage, clean design
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased that this oil sprayer seems to cover a larger area than most sprayers, which is quite helpful when using it to prepare foods for an air fryer if you want them extra crispy. It is easy to use and easy to pump prior to spraying. I use extra-light olive oil in my sprayer. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: francisdrew

customer_reviews.title: This is a great mister!
customer_reviews.text: I've used other misters, and this one definitely works the best of the bunch! The mist is fine and even. And it doesn't clog if you maintain it properly. Unfortunately, I had to replace my first one because I got a spot of mold in a spot where I couldn't reach it, but honestly, I think this was my fault for not cleaning it as often as I should have per the instructions. It's not super easy to clean, which is why I don't do it as often as I should, but that's true of all the misters because you're dealing with oil.
customer_reviews.author: S. Landry

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: On my second one. Use the gray for olive oil, now bought this black for vegetable oil. The first one I've had for several months and working great. Another brand of mister that's very well known clogged very early on. This one has given me no problem. It does spray better after the first couple of uses, like it has to get "primed'.
customer_reviews.author: J W

customer_reviews.title: this sprayer is just poor
customer_reviews.text: This device is built well and wuuld be easy to clean but calling it a sprayer is an over statement. it does spray the oil for a second then turns into a fine stream. I probably should go back to the drawing board.
customer_reviews.author: W. S.

customer_reviews.title: Zero waste friendly!
customer_reviews.text: Best sprayer I have used so far! And I have used a few, including Pampered Chef's. I use avacado oil in mine. I love that I don't have chemical propellents, strange ingredients, and am being zero waste!
customer_reviews.author: Marion

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product!!! I had purchased spray bottles of olive oil at Costco. Loved the convenience. But, when I tried to buy them again, the product was gone. Saw this bottle on Amazon and thought I'd give it a try. Worked perfectly!!. Now I have spray olive oil whenever I need it. Great for spraying pans, roasting veggies, grilling whatever. Planning on getting another, so that I can add a different flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Tina K.

customer_reviews.title: Works for me!
customer_reviews.text: I'm totally happy with this. I was skeptical, but my wife kept making fun of me for buying the aerosol cans. So I tried this. I've been using this for the last nine months, mainly for popcorn. It serves my purposes. You put the olive oil in it with a little water and "pump it up!" Olive oil spray! I've had no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan L.

customer_reviews.title: Tried many, this is the best
customer_reviews.text: Best oil mister I have ever tried and I've tried multiple. So far has not leaked or stopped spraying a nice fine mist. Highly recommend. **
customer_reviews.author: SaxMD

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the Fine Life oil sprayer when it worked. I’m on my second one but both broke maybe a month in while pumping air into the bottle. It sounds like air is coming out as fast as it goes in as you pump. I thought I was too rough with the first one so I got a second one and consciously reminded myself to be gentle. It broke with easy pumping and now can only spray with little pressure. Bummer. I use my air fryer a lot and a nice oil pump is necessary. I may just go with a manual spray bottle type oil sprayer.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to any kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for managing cooking oil. I want to be better about unnecessary extra calories, but I don’t really care for Pam spray. This does a great job keeping me accountable for the oil I use. Very useful when it comes to pan cooking or roasting veggies in the oven. I do find that the nozzle can get a bit greasy, but that is to be expected.
customer_reviews.author: kmaylava

customer_reviews.title: Get it!
customer_reviews.text: I just got it so I have not cleaned it yet. It comes with clear and simple instructions. After I followed them it worked great. Definitely worth it! I had purchased a spray bottle without pump action before: it works for misting vinegar, but not for misting oil. You NEED the pump action.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sprayer/seller
customer_reviews.text: 1/6/18 Update - had to follow sellers’ instructions to get this working again but started misting perfectly in just a couple seconds. Definitely best mister to get. Original review - Excellent fine mist sprayer. Has been most consistent and best quality of all tried. Did have issue with mist approximately 8 months after purchase but seller (Avolara) guarantees the product and immediately provided simple instructions to get it working again when contacted. And a lot of less expensive misters had issues from day first used and were waste of money. Definitely recommend this product and seller.
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: This works fantastically! It's so nice to be able to stop using (and buying) the aerosol cans and have this product instead. Great for any cook or baker!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Moorman

customer_reviews.title: Find a better one
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine as a mister for a bit then it became a thick stream of oil, now it's just clogged up. A complete waste of money in my opinion
customer_reviews.author: 4fuxsake

customer_reviews.title: Classy mister
customer_reviews.text: I use my olive oil mister to spritz meats and vegetables when I cook with my Power Air Fryer XL and spritz my stove top fry pans.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Oil mister-- a healthier way to cook
customer_reviews.text: Love it. This is much more healthy than the aerosol spray which has a lot of chemicals in it. Misting oil is great. And you use way less pil. A very fine but adequate spray directly on food, can use to spray salads also with olive oil. A truly great product.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Really like this Mister
customer_reviews.text: I've used my Mister 4 times so far without a problem. It's easy to pump even with sore hands. The amount that sprays out is great and easy to control. I like the mister so much better than aerosol sprays. I hope it will continue to work as well as it does now.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: This olive oil mister is pretty awesome. I've used a Pampered Chef oil mister for years, and this one is WAY better. It pumps fast, sprays continuously and evenly, and hasn't once clogged.
customer_reviews.author: Amy J.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for spritzing a little olive oil or anything else you might want to spray on food. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: R Wright

customer_reviews.title: fine life oil spritzer
customer_reviews.text: Will be using the product for olive oil. I should have researched the product a little more. It is made in China. I would have looked at another product. Just my two cents worth.
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: Spending 3 times the price for the Fine Life Ideal Oil Mister seemed extreme
customer_reviews.text: I had a Misto Oil Sprayer for several years, but when I went to recently replace it, the new ones failed to work properly. I tried twice and both new Misto Oil Sprayers were defective. Spending 3 times the price for the Fine Life Ideal Oil Mister seemed extreme, but it works perfectly and holds the air pressure between uses. The spray pattern is even and consistent. It's worth the extra cost to have a mister that actually works!
customer_reviews.author: eyes88

customer_reviews.title: My Wife’s Marinara Screams Flavor Town
customer_reviews.text: We use this in conjunction with some other utensils in the kitchen. My wife’s marinara screams flavor town now! We won’t look at the kitchen the same ever again! Thanks Olive Oil Mister!
customer_reviews.author: Joe Dynamite

customer_reviews.title: My favorite Oil Mister!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second mister I've owned. Unlike other misters I've owned in the past, this one works consistently and for years! The first one I purchased about three years ago, and it was still misting beautifully until I melted a whole in side.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle HL

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, Cheap Plastic
customer_reviews.text: While the stress fractures look cool, they certainly don't do much for keeping a vacuum. At first I wasn't even sure that's what they were, because they started relatively early on (less than 25 uses), and then of course rapidly grew until it became completely useless. It wound up being about $1 per use, all told. Not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: drjmetz

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use -- just pump about 7 or 8 ...
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use -- just pump about 7 or 8 times. When you press on the button, you get a light and consistent mist. Being able to spray a light mist is very useful, especially when preparing food for an air fryer. While some oil is needed, you don't want to add too much.
customer_reviews.author: MetroWest

customer_reviews.title: so far so good. Seems easy to clean and spray is a ...
customer_reviews.text: so far so good. Seems easy to clean and spray is a fine mist perfect for my needs. I have since bought a second one for vinegar. The only thing that would improve this product is if it were available in glass. For now they look nice on my table and I no longer drown my salad. The oil mister also great for cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Perlman

customer_reviews.title: Ideal Oil Mister Sprayer 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have used this regularly since I purchased it and it works as promise. I primarily use to spray my meats and vegetables just prior to grilling or cooking in my Air Fryer. The spray comes out evenly and the best part is it adds the right amount unlike when I just dropped from a bottle. I have also found it to be very well made.
customer_reviews.author: John C. McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Breaks quickly - cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: Broke after a dozen or so uses , before even finishing one fill of the canister with oil. I tried returning but it was past the 30 day Amazon policy, so they would not accept. Very cheap quality for very expensive price.
customer_reviews.author: Dbrewno

customer_reviews.title: Buy This Product You'll Love It!
customer_reviews.text: Easy, convenient and doesn't clog. Great for lightly spraying baking pans and cookware. Plus you know what's going on your food. Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.author: Kathy's Notes

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Tried several other misters, but none work as well as this one. It's a little pricey compared to the others, but this one will stay in the kitchen instead of winding up in the trash. Excellent product if you want something that will give you an even spray without clogging if you follow the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Prime User

customer_reviews.title: Saves money and convenient.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for coconut oil for cooking in my air fryer. The aerosol cans of oils were expensive. This is very economical for any oil and uses air pressure not a artificial propellant. The oil is a mist from this. My sister has purchased one after s using mine.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yours may not last
customer_reviews.text: Great product while it lasted. But, only lasted a couple of months before noticing that the cap is splitting in several locations.
customer_reviews.author: Charles A.

customer_reviews.title: Durable and sprays like an aerosol with nothing but oil!
customer_reviews.text: Best sprayer I have had! You pump it up so it sprays like a regular aerosol can. It’s also durable plastic so it won’t break on me when it gets knocked over like my glass one did.
customer_reviews.author: jporter

customer_reviews.title: Best oil mister EVER!
customer_reviews.text: Best oil mister EVER! I've had several misto pumps through the years and gave up on finding something that works more than a few months. I bought this 6 months ago and it still works better than the misto ever did and I just bought 7 more for christmas gifts!!
customer_reviews.author: KirstenCFS

customer_reviews.title: Love This Olive Oil Mister!
customer_reviews.text: I've had other oil misters that leaked, didn't work or didn't have a fine enough spray. This one works the best! No clogs, no problems!
customer_reviews.author: jaci

customer_reviews.title: Terrible!
customer_reviews.text: This product is terrible! Couldn’t get it to work so I wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: Rita B. Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Fine mist!!!
customer_reviews.text: Omggggg I have brought several sprayer trying to save money and nothing has made me happy like this one !! It really does have a fine mist !!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Alisa Hanner Smith

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST!
customer_reviews.text: Now this is a Mister ! ! ! It's doesn't squirt or any of those bad things. You get a nice even mist. I've tried 2 others and always had to return them. This one is staying right here and I might even get another one for different type of oil. I really like this mister.
customer_reviews.author: Jean C. Staib

customer_reviews.title: Great Mister! Worked perfect with olive oil!
customer_reviews.text: This this is legit! It atomized oil very well! I'd say that when it's used with olive oil it's on par with Pam Spray, except it doesn't have all the chemicals found in Pam. The manufacture did send me a ton of annoying emails asking if I was satisfied and if I'd review their product, they might wanna ease up on the B.S. it's way over the top!
customer_reviews.author: Elgin

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I just got my mister a few weeks ago and am very happy with it. It's easy to use and allows me to use my air fryer without adding a lot of oil.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth M. Lunceford

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time with an El Cheapo
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as described. Well worth the price. I earlier bought a cheaper brand from Amazon that didn't work at all. I figured that all of the misters were the same. I saw the Fine Life mister and read the reviews. Based on the reviews and the higher price I decided to give it a try under the "you get what you pay for" theory. I was right. Don't waste your time a cheaper one that probably won't work.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Davis

customer_reviews.title: The mister is easy to use & broadcasts a very fine spray
customer_reviews.text: I've used this mister twice, for applying a light coating of olive oil on the cast iron cooking grate of my grill before grilling. The mister is easy to use & broadcasts a very fine spray. I'm very impressed by the quality and functionality. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: snuffy

customer_reviews.title: Great Oil Mister!!
customer_reviews.text: This Olive Oil Mister works great, just as expected if not better. I am now able to control how much oil I use, less goes much further. I love how fine a mist this creates as well. I am thinking about getting another one to use with balsamic vinegar. I know you will not be disappointed by this product!
customer_reviews.author: J M

customer_reviews.title: I was so impressed with the mister. I even bought more as gifts for Christmas.
customer_reviews.text: BUT as soon as I did, the mister quit working the way it had. It lost the air for spray...we had to pump it numerous times to make it work...I read what to do which I did but it still is not working as it did when we first bought it.
customer_reviews.author: susan hanson

customer_reviews.title: PURE JUNK
customer_reviews.text: RUN FROM THIS! It’s simply expensive junk. The worst kitchen gadget ever. Just put it in the trash. Pump comes apart. Tried for zero stars, but the review required one to submit.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce C. Hansel

customer_reviews.title: gave it a good washing, put olive oil in it
customer_reviews.text: Pulled it out of the box, gave it a good washing, put olive oil in it, pumped it a few times and it worked like I hoped it would. Nice clean spray, no dribbling just a fine mist that I was looking for. Great Item, would buy again when this one quits performing.
customer_reviews.author: Michael G. Holley

customer_reviews.title: More durable than the last 2 oil spritzers
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item for my husband to replace our EVO stainless steel spritzer. This one works much better, keeps your hands clean (several of them drip and you end up covered in oil) and is easy to use. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: M. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This works great for lightly misting Olive Oil on my popcorn. Or salad or anything else you don't want to pour a glob of oil onto. It pumps easily, holds a nice charge/pressure if you will and seems very durable. A bit pricey but worth it. A nice fine mist and easy to clean. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Just soapin

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my absolute favorite kitchen tools! I use it daily, and it never fails to perform. I had others than stopped working after a short time, but not this jewel! I love it so much until I have given it to others as a gift, and I just ordered another one for myself so I can use two different kinds of oils. Buy one because you will love it!
customer_reviews.author: A Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Finally!
customer_reviews.text: Terrific! Instructions are clear and precise. And it WORKS! I used a competing product for a while but it always, ALWAYS ended up sputtering...I think I have finally found the right mister! Also very pleased with the friendly and professional customer service. Fine Life makes a real effort to connect with their customers.
customer_reviews.author: christina

customer_reviews.title: Effective fine mist spray of oils
customer_reviews.text: Actually creates a fine mist spray using a pump to pressurize the oil. Works well. Another “sprayer“ I purchased just ejects oil without any aeration. Both useful in different ways, however this is great for misting popcorn before sprinkling on spices or garlic salt, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Black-Gray T-55 test man

customer_reviews.title: Better replacement for one that broke
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this more expensive (and larger) mister to replace thewhich I bought two years earlier. The screw cap of the Zyliss broke, rendering it useless. I chose this as a replacement and so far am very happy with the quality of its construction and with the quality of its spray.
customer_reviews.author: J. Stephen Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Great product and customer service
customer_reviews.text: As most of the reviews state, this is a wonderful product. The Fine Life also provides wonderful customer service. I received a defective item at first and notified the File Life team. They immediately set up a phone call when it was convenient for me and promptly sent a replacement product free of charge. They even personally tested the replacement mister before sending it to me to ensure it wouldn't happen again.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Bachman

customer_reviews.title: It’s just okay
customer_reviews.text: This is not exactly a great design, I would rather not have to pump the bottle every few sprays. Probably would not order again
customer_reviews.author: Brad and Melanie Walker

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: I was buying a spray can of olive oil for years from a popular market but in the last few months they stopped making it. The misto kind I had before was awful and I wanted to cook with MINIMAL oil. Other people's reviews said it was light and even. They were correct! It is controllable and not too much at all.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: 2nd return in less than 30 days
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I’m returning in less than 30 days. Both have had the same issue, the top section has a large crack which allows the air to escape when pumping to build pressure. I really want to like this product, and as soon as I get one that works I’ll be a happy camper. Will order it one more time and then go on to another product that has higher quality if I get the same problem.
customer_reviews.author: Alton

customer_reviews.title: Does just what I want it to do.
customer_reviews.text: The olive oil mister works perfectly. After seeing some of the negative ratings I was a little hesitant I have had no problems with it; does just what I want it to do.
customer_reviews.author: S. Miers

customer_reviews.title: so much better than PAM
customer_reviews.text: This works a lot better than most misters I have tried, but it isn't perfect. It requires you to pump quite a bit for just a few seconds of misting. Definitely better than buying cooking oil spray or pouring oil directly on your food.
customer_reviews.author: spartty

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I wish I had done it sooner. The pump is easy, the sprayer is effective, for a large cookie sheet and my preference of oil I did the pump cycle twice, for a small cookie sheet I did it one time.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Tabler

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: This has been working well for us. I read where a lot of misters clog up or spray big droplets. We have not had that problem with this unit. We may not use it for awhile, take it out, pump it, and it sprays fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Use real oil-avoid additives.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for my daughter & son-in-law. They recently got an air fryer & wanted to use olive oil without additives when prepping food for the air fryer. Also, they felt they could save money by not purchasing cans of aerosol cooking spray. They are very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: pamommom

product_meta.title: Ideal Olive Oil Sprayer Mister - Premium Air Pressure Only Clog-Free Cooking Oil Mist for Salads, Baking, Grilling, Air Fryers by The Fine Life - Black
product_meta.description:
Size:M1BlackWe're very proud The Fine Life's Olive Oil Mister has been named "#1" in Best Oil Misters | March 2015 through 2020.

 Have you been looking for a way to eliminate chemical laden aerosol propellants in store bought cooking oil sprays?

 We loved the convenience of those products but realized it's more important to eat healthy than to save a few seconds.

 And we were tired of wiping excess expensive oil out of our pans or pouring it down the kitchen sink.

 We'd rather use pure oil without additives.

 Friends told us they kept trying those cheap aluminum tube olive oil sprayers. They didn't work so they kept tossing them in the trash.

 There had to be a better way!

 Introducing Our Ideal Olive Oil Mister by The Fine Life ™

 You can have all the flavor you want without the calories or chemicals!

 Just use your favorite oils, lemon juice or vinegar and natural air pressure.

 You create an ultra-light mist to:

 * coat your air fryer, pans, grills & BBQ

 * add just the right amount to your salads, omelettes, baking and more

 * prep your meat, fish & veggies

 * get your salt and spices to stick to your popcorn

 It works! See in our reviews that our customers come up with new ways to use theirs and share how!

 No Glass Used

 This unique container is made from ultra light-weight food-safe transparent Tritan (TM) not heavy glass, so it's safe to use in your kitchen or patio, at the office, on your boat or RV.

 Premium Clog-Free Filter

 Thanks to its high-end filter only clear fresh fluids are spray misted on your food.

 Easy To Use

 The wide neck refillable transparent canister means you can use and re-use. A few pumps of the top and you've got simple air pressure inside. Press and hold the nozzle to get an ultra-fine mist. 

 Risk-Free

 You get a manufacturer's one-year 100% satisfaction guarantee.

 Get Your Ideal Oil Mister Today And Enjoy A Healthier Life
feature_bullets: ENHANCE YOUR HEALTH & LIFE - Using an Air Fryer? On a Paleo Diet, use HCG or just love flavor? The Fine Life(TM) Ideal Oil Mister lets you spray exactly the amount of oil you want to use, where you want to use it - This air pressure system eliminates smelly chemical propellants from your food or wasted expensive oil poured down your drain! - Now you can manage your calories while you eat all your favorite foods. Flavor up with olive oil, lemon juice, vinegar, sesame oil and more.

DESIGNED WITH THE HIGHEST QUALITY MATERIALS - "So glad it isn't glass!" our users tell us. Your new oil sprayer is safe on any surface. SHAPED for a comfortable grip, it's LIGHT WEIGHT so it's easy for every member of the family to hold and use. And without glass, it's safe to use everywhere you'd like to take it. Carry it from kitchen to BBQ to patio, beach, boat or RV. Toss it in your bag to take to the office. We've even had it used for a water mist at the golf course and at the beach!

BEATS ALL THE OTHERS ON THE MARKET - WHY is everyone complaining about all those cheap cooking olive oil sprayers you see below on the page? Read their most recent reviews instead of the ones from years ago! Because they splatter, leak and break. Users get so frustrated they just throw them out. The Ideal Oil Mister sprayer solves ALL those issues! It WORKS and you'll use it for years. It's made with light weight food safe materials - easy to fill, pump, hold and use for kids and adults alike.

REFILL AND REUSE - This unique model produces such a FINE MIST you use so little oil it will last for weeks. The perfect cooking oil accessory your air fryer, grilling and baking. Fill it with an inch or two of olive oil. The rest of the space lets you pump up AIR pressure. Use your favorite oils for popcorn, salad, veggies, fish, meats, omelettes. - Even INFUSE your own flavors. The clear container lets you see exactly what's inside and the premium filter makes sure only pure oil is spritzed.

RISK-FREE 100% GUARANTEE. We stand by our olive oil sprayers and want you to have the same great experience other Ideal Olive Oil Mister customers are having. LIKE THEM, YOUâ??LL WANT MORE THAN ONE ON HAND - GREY, BLACK & RED models let you put different cooking oils in each one and have them right at your fingertips. Buy one or more for your oils, vinegars, lemon juice, and more. Stock up to give them as gifts. SPECIAL PRICING AVAILABLE - See the multi-packs & bundles listed with each model.
